rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0001
rows.name: Right, let's get started.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0002
rows.name: Well, before that, I need to clear something up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0003
rows.name: Commander?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0004
rows.name: I know you're wondering...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0005
rows.name:
After the bogus Lifehold lead,
we had the Pathfinders turned inside out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0006
rows.name:
Sure enough, we found evidence that someone
messed with FrontierNav—they planted that phony data. [ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0007
rows.name: You mean...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0008
rows.name: We got a spy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0009
rows.name:
That's right—one of our own is
working with the Ganglion. This...was an inside job.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0010
rows.name: One question, Commander—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0011
rows.name: Like we don't have enough to worry about...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0012
rows.name:
And here I am, sending you all out
RIGHT into that death trap... Dammit.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0013
rows.name: I don't know what else to say, except... I'm sorry.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0014
rows.name: I hope you'll forgive me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0015
rows.name: [ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0016
rows.name: Tatsu like muscle man better when he angry and yelling.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0017
rows.name:
Zip it, pip-squeak, or you'll be
seasoned and fried by breakfast.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0019
rows.name:
Tatsu has a point, though.
It's not like you to dwell on mistakes, Commander.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0020
rows.name: Especially when they weren't your mistakes to begin with.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0021
rows.name: Wouldn't you agree?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_JNK0010
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: xs10040100_SEL0011
rows.name: Absolve the Commander of any guilt.

rows.label: xs10040100_JNK0020
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: xs10040100_SEL0021
rows.name: Tell Elma a simple apology isn't enough.

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0022
rows.name: Well, but—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0023
rows.name:
No buts about it, sir. And no more apologies, okay?
We survived, after all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0024
rows.name: Now, let's see that surly taskmaster we all know and love![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0025
rows.name: That's right. Your orders, Commander?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0026
rows.name: Yup, I deserve that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0027
rows.name:
Well, look at the bright side—
we made it home safe and sound, didn't we?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0028
rows.name: True. It definitely could have gone a lot worse.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0029
rows.name:
Either way, we don't need you to apologize.
What we need you to do right now is lead.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0030
rows.name: So...your orders, Commander?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0031
rows.name: Well, put it that way...who am I to argue?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0032
rows.name:
All right, touchy-feely time is over—
I've got your next assignment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0033
rows.name:
We need you to head out and fix
a key data probe that's on the fritz.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0034
rows.name:
It's way out in northern Sylvalum.
We'll get you the coordinates.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0035
rows.name:
Yes, sir—with pleasure.
Repair missions are my specialty.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0036
rows.name: That's why we picked you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0037
rows.name:
That, and...the Ganglion have been quiet lately.
Too quiet. I don't like it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0038
rows.name: Yeah. I've been thinking the same thing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0039
rows.name:
In your report, the...Wrothian, was it?
He made it sound like they've got a base tucked away.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0040
rows.name:
Someplace with black rocks and lava...
That's gotta be Cauldros, yeah?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0041
rows.name: I think it's a safe assumption, yes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0042
rows.name: Well, anyway...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0043
rows.name:
As you might have guessed, the idea of a big ol'
Ganglion base here on Mira does not exactly thrill me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0044
rows.name: Agreed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0045
rows.name:
And with Lao sidelined,
we're gonna have to pick up the slack.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0046
rows.name: Yup—so let's get that probe fixed, all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10040100_MSG0047
rows.name:
We're really gettin' down to the wire here...
Where in the hell is that core?![ST:wait ]
